attributes.user_problem: My React app crashes when I click the submit button
attributes.initial_hypothesis: Likely a state management issue or event handler error
attributes.analysis_approach: Check error logs, examine event handler, review state updates
attributes.agent_output: I'll help you debug this. First, can you share the error message from the console?

attributes.identified_issue: Event parameter not being passed correctly
attributes.agent_output: The error suggests the event object is undefined. This typically happens when the handler is called without proper binding. Ensure the handler is properly attached: onClick={handleSubmit} not onClick={handleSubmit()}
attributes.agent_reasoning: The error suggests the event object is undefined. This typically happens when the handler is called without proper binding.
attributes.suggested_fix: Ensure the handler is properly attached: onClick={handleSubmit} not onClick={handleSubmit()}
